name: Heist N' Heat: Infinite
description:
Heist N' Heat: Infinite

In Heist N' Heat, players take control of a menacing muscle car racing to rob as much cash as they can before they run out of fuel. Players must execute daring drifts and maniacal maneuvers to outrun the law enforcement in pursuit. 

Twitch chat has the option of helping or hurting their streamer via chat commands. Twitch chat can spawn ramps, fuel, and boosts to help their streamers or rain down missiles and spawn roadblocks to hurt them. 

Join the Heist now and get more heated than ever!

-----

Credits (Alphabet Order):

Adiya, Aidan Sugrue, Amos Dong, Anqi Zhu, Fushan Wang, Lionel Lopez, Lei Zhao, Mingyuan Chen, Steven Su, Xuan Zheng, Ziyang Wang
